tables.table_schema:
CREATE TABLE UserProfile (
    user_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    username STRING,
    email STRING,
    age INT,
    room_id INT,
    lighting_settings JSONB
);

CREATE TABLE lighting_settings (
    setting_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    user_id INT REFERENCES users(user_id),
    room_id INT REFERENCES rooms(room_id),
    brightness INT,
    color TEXT
);

CREATE TABLE user_room_mapping (
    mapping_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    user_id INT,
    room_id INT,
    FOREIGN KEY (user_id) REFERENCES user_profiles(user_id),
    FOREIGN KEY (room_id) REFERENCES room_preferences(room_id)
);

CREATE TABLE UserProfiles (
    user_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    first_name VARCHAR(50),
    last_name VARCHAR(50),
    email VARCHAR(100),
    phone_number VARCHAR(15)
)

CREATE TABLE UserPreferences (
    user_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    theme VARCHAR(50),
    language VARCHAR(50),
    notification_enabled BOOLEAN
)

CREATE TABLE Rooms (
    room_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    room_name VARCHAR(50),
    room_type VARCHAR(50),
    light_intensity INT,
    temperature FLOAT
)

CREATE TABLE LightingSettings (
    setting_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    room_id INT,
    brightness INT,
    color_temperature INT
)

CREATE TABLE UserRooms (
    user_id INT,
    room_id INT,
    PRIMARY KEY (user_id, room_id)
)
